profileText: a Representative from Iowa; born in Hull, Sioux County, Iowa, January 14, 1969; graduated from Western Christian High School, Hull, Iowa, 1987; B.A., Dordt College, Sioux Center, Iowa, 1991; M.P.A., Iowa State University, Ames, Iowa; attending Northcentral University, La Jolla, Calif.; business manager; bank insurance manager; faculty, Dordt College, Sioux Center, Iowa; city administrator, Hull, Iowa, 1999-2006; treasurer, Sioux County, Iowa, 2006-2008; member of the Iowa state senate, 2009-2020; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2021-present).
